data.text: did you cycle across Switzerland ? The prices are so high there ! How did you do this cheaply ?
data.author: Cynthia Nielson

data.text: Indeed Switzerland is expensive, almost twice the cost of Italy in places, I was quite happy in that regard to cross over the Umbrail pass and ride into Bormio. I am a member of Warmshowers and Couchsurfing. So I picked a few local communities groups and wrote some posts asking if people would have time to show me around town or point out nice places to visit wherever I decided to stop. Sometimes I had offers of Accomodation, sometime I was met at a recommended cafe for a chat other times I had no reply. Switzerland is a stunningly beautiful country to cycle but the weather can change quickly in the Alps although your quite aware of that with your experience. I also use komoot to plan several of my trips so I‚Äôm happy to share routes or POI that I have been to if it interests you just let me know. üëç
